articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Virat Kohli doesn't think boundaries enough': Vaughan spots missing element - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Despite his swashbuckling form, former England captain Michael Vaughan has spotted a missing element in Kohli's batting. | Cricket
articles.content: Virat Kohli is back setting the IPL on fire. With 333 runs from eight matches that includes five half-centuries, Kohli currently sits second in the Orange Cap list for IPL 2023. For someone who strugâ€¦ [+2930 chars]
